text: Geffert may refer to: * 12747 Michageffert, a main-belt asteroid, named after Michael Geffert * 17855 Geffert, a main-belt asteroid, named after Martin Geffert * Johannes Geffert (born 1951), a German organist * Martin Geffert (1922–2015) a German amateur astronomer * Michael Geffert (born 1953), a German astronomer and discoverer of minor planets * Viliam Geffert (born 1955), a Slovak theoretical computer scientist
title: Geffert
